alert.note: Alert for Interior Cumberland Highlands; Southern Franklin; Southern Oxford (Maine) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued December 23 at 3:11PM EST until December 24 at 2:00AM EST by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 2 AM EST SATURDAY... * WHAT...South winds shifting southwest 15 to 25 mph with gusts up to 50 mph. * WHERE...Portions of western Maine. Portions of central, northern, and southern New Hampshire. * WHEN...Until 2 AM EST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds will blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Locally higher gusts may be possible in or around stronger showers of squall lines through this evening.
info.instruction: Winds this strong can make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Use extra caution.

area.areaDesc: Interior Cumberland Highlands; Southern Franklin; Southern Oxford
